## Summary
What happened?

## Timeline
When did it start, when was it detected, when resolved?

## Impact
Who/what was affected?

## Root Cause
What caused the incident?

## Actions Taken
What did you do to fix it?

## Lessons Learned
How can we prevent this in future?
